hero.subtitle: PALANTIR-CODE is Spain's first certified Plane partner. We help teams ship faster with expert implementation, migration, and custom solutions for Plane's unified workspace.

planeCompose.title: Plane for
planeCompose.description: Introducing <1>Plane Compose</1>, the implementation layer of Projects-as-Code. A model where a project's structure becomes a first-class artifact: defined in code, versioned in Git, and reviewed like any other change.
planeCompose.subtitle: Bring Git-style discipline to project management
planeCompose.subtitleDesc: Version your project configuration, review changes through PRs, and standardize structures across your organization.
planeCompose.feature1Desc: Initialize a project scaffold instantly with CLI
planeCompose.feature2Desc: Define workflows, states, labels, types & custom fields as code
planeCompose.feature3Desc: plane schema pull/push & plane pull/push for seamless sync
planeCompose.feature4Desc: Clone and replicate project structure across workspaces

whyPlane.title: Why Teams Choose
whyPlane.description: Plane is the open-source project management platform that gives you everything you need to plan, track, and ship.
whyPlane.projectsDesc: Customizable workflows, dependency tracking, and flexible boards to manage any project type.
whyPlane.wikiDesc: Built-in documentation with rich text editor and publishable pages for your team's knowledge base.
whyPlane.aiDesc: Automate routine tasks and gain insights across projects with intelligent automation.
whyPlane.deploymentDesc: Cloud, Self-hosted, or Airgapped options to meet your security and compliance requirements.

testimonials.label: TESTIMONIALS
testimonials.title: What Teams Say About
testimonials.description: Over 1M+ users trust Plane. Here's what some of them have to say.

importers.title: Switch without the struggle
importers.description: Leave Jira, Linear, ClickUp, or Asana without leaving your data behind. Our expert migration ensures zero data loss.

integrations.title: Integrate everywhere
integrations.description: Work from Slack, GitHub, GitLab, or wherever your team lives. We help you connect Plane to your entire workflow.

services.title: Expert Consulting Services
services.description: From migration to managed services, we provide end-to-end support for your Plane journey.
services.migrationDesc: Seamlessly migrate from Jira, Linear, ClickUp, or Asana to Plane.
services.implementationDesc: Get started with Plane the right way with expert setup and configuration.
services.developmentDesc: Extend Plane's capabilities with custom integrations and automations.
services.managedDesc: Focus on your business while we manage your Plane infrastructure.

solutions.title: Solutions for Every Team
solutions.description: Pre-built accelerators and templates to get your team up and running with Plane quickly.
solutions.marketingDesc: Campaign management, content calendars, and creative workflows in Plane.
solutions.salesDesc: Sales pipelines, CRM workflows, and deal tracking to close more deals.
solutions.hrDesc: Onboarding workflows, performance reviews, and employee management.
solutions.operationsDesc: Process automation, resource management, and operational efficiency.
solutions.financeDesc: Budget approvals, expense tracking workflows, and financial planning.
solutions.itDesc: Incident management, service desk, and infrastructure workflows.
solutions.supportDesc: Support ticketing, SLA management, and customer success workflows.
solutions.rdDesc: Product development, innovation tracking, and research management.

whyUs.title: Why Choose
whyUs.description: As Spain's first certified Plane partner, we bring unmatched expertise and dedication to every project.
whyUs.certifiedPartnerDesc: We were the first company in Spain to achieve official Plane partnership status.
whyUs.deepExpertiseDesc: Years of experience with project management tools and enterprise implementations.
whyUs.bilingualSupportDesc: Full support in both English and Spanish for seamless communication.
whyUs.enterpriseSecurityDesc: SOC 2, GDPR, and ISO27001 compliant solutions for enterprise requirements.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Project Management?
cta.description: Join the growing number of teams using Plane to ship faster and collaborate better. Let us help you get started.

about.title: About
about.heroDesc: We are a team of project management experts dedicated to helping organizations unlock the full potential of Plane. As Spain's first certified partner, we bring unmatched expertise and commitment to every engagement.
about.missionP1: At PALANTIR-CODE, our mission is to empower organizations to work more efficiently and effectively through modern project management solutions.
about.missionP2: We believe that the right tools, properly implemented, can transform how teams collaborate and deliver value. That's why we've partnered with Plane â€“ a powerful, open-source platform that gives teams the flexibility and control they need.
about.missionP3: Our team combines deep technical expertise with a genuine passion for helping our clients succeed. Whether you're migrating from another tool or starting fresh, we're here to guide you every step of the way.
about.valuesDesc: The principles that guide everything we do.
about.excellenceDesc: We strive for excellence in every project, ensuring our clients receive the best possible solutions.
about.partnershipDesc: We work alongside our clients as true partners, invested in their long-term success.
about.dedicationDesc: Our team is dedicated to understanding and solving our clients' unique challenges.
about.trustDesc: We build trust through transparency, reliability, and consistent delivery.
about.milestone2025Desc: Became the first certified Plane partner in Spain, establishing our expertise in the platform.
about.milestone2024Desc: PALANTIR-CODE was founded with a mission to help organizations transform their project management.
about.certifiedExpertiseDesc: Spain's first and only certified Plane partner.
about.bilingualSupportDesc: Full support in English and Spanish.
about.enterpriseSecurityDesc: SOC 2, GDPR, and ISO27001 compliant solutions.
about.dedicatedTeamDesc: A committed team focused on your success.
about.readyDesc: Let's discuss how we can help you succeed with Plane.
